alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 7:03PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN NEW LONDON...MIDDLESEX AND SOUTHEASTERN NEW HAVEN COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EDT... At 703 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Coventry to near East Hampton to near North Branford to near Guilford. Movement was northeast at 90 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Haven, Middletown, Wallingford, Norwich, New London, Guilford, Colchester, Clinton, East Hampton, Groton, Old Saybrook, Durham, Salem, Chester, and Mystic. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southern Connecticut.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
